me kathawa blog ekata danna issella deparak hithuwa.mokada bariwelawath idala hitala blog eke dana mage wruththiya athdakim walata sambandha kenek me wisthara dakkoth eeka hari nathi hinda.kohomath daiwagnyayo wechchi api wage aya thaman lagata ena ayage paudgalikathwaya rakinna oona.nathnam eeka ape wruththiyata ayahapath balapam athi karanawa.blog eke liyanne itha thadin digu kalina mathakayata ka wadunu dewal witharayi.eewayinuth walwataram ayin karala meka kiyawana ayata idiriyedi prayojanawath wiya haki wadagath dewal thamayi liyanne.jyothishayata sambandha blogayak nisa pili panala liyannath bane.
